channel.title: Travel on Akhil
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Akhil

item.title: Driving on Autobahn: Another bucket list ✔️
item.description: My fascination with cars started in my childhood, fueled by the occasional Fast Track magazine that my cousin used to buy and bring home around the mid-2000s. Reading about supercars, the time when the Bugatti Veyron broke the speed record—these articles in the magazine were incredibly engaging for me. Then I read about the Autobahn in Germany, where there were no speed limits in certain sections, which got me even more excited.

item.title: My First Skydive experience.
item.description: Everything you love is on the other side of maximum fear Skydive Dubai is known for its safest tandem jump with an awesome view of Palm Jumeirah, though a bit expensive compared to other Drop zones. Skydiving was one of the activity that I had decided to do before I leave Dubai. And today I did it. Me and my collegue Jesvin (who also happens to be my Team lead at office :D) made bookings in Skydive Dubai for the morning slot at 10:45 AM.
